name: INDailyRoutineRelevanceProvider.Situation
desc: Daily situations for a relevance provider.

items.name: case morning
items.desc: A situation that occurs during the morning.

items.name: case evening
items.desc: A situation that occurs in the evening.

items.name: case home
items.desc: A situation that occurs at the user’s home.

items.name: case work
items.desc: A situation that occurs at the user’s place of work.

items.name: case school
items.desc: A situation that occurs at the user’s school.

items.name: case gym
items.desc: A situation that occurs at the gym.

items.name: case commute
items.desc: A situation that occurs during a daily commute.

items.name: case headphonesConnected
items.desc: A situation that occurs with connected headphones.

items.name: case activeWorkout
items.desc: A situation that occurs during an active workout.

items.name: case physicalActivityIncomplete
items.desc: A situation occurs that causes a physical activity to become incomplete.
